aircraft.value: Warhawk Combat - AC-2814-904 at Base Bravo

defect_observed.value: Wheel brake assembly seizure. Abnormality observed during system test.

root_cause.value: Manufacturing defect in material composition leading to premature failure

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Cargo Handling component. Inspection revealed damage to critical components.

corrective_action.value: Clean and re-lubricate affected assemblies per technical manual

preventive_action.value: Update technical documentation with lessons learned

remarks_investigation.value: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.

remarks_design.value: Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate. Date: 20/02/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality aspects reviewed. Manufacturing process controls are adequate. Recommend supplier quality audit. Date: 21/02/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User feedback incorporated. Recommend enhanced crew training on system operation and limitations. Date: 22/02/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality aspects from regulatory perspective reviewed. Investigation methodology is comprehensive and acceptable. Date: 24/02/2024 Signature: Dr. A.K. Sharma

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Certification review completed. Proposed modifications do not affect type design approval. Acceptable. Date: 26/02/2024 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh
